DOC.brief_summary: 100 patient age 21-40 year old , diagnosed primary secondary infertility . These patient assign receive fertility treatment ( ovulation induction , ICSI , intrauterine insemination IVF ) . They undergo 3D vaginal ultrasound treatment measure junctional zone thickness follow treatment determine rate implantation .
DOC.brief_title: 3D Ultrasound Measurement Junctional Zone Thickness Its Relation Implantation Success
DOC.criteria: infertile woman congenital uterine anomaly medical disease contraindicating pregnancy
